question_text: Which statement accurately describes how SAS supports fault-tolerant enterprise storage setups?
answer_options: SAS supports built-in data encryption for all drives
SAS connectors require unique host bus adapters for each drive
SAS allows for dual-ported drives, enabling redundant data paths
SAS mirrors each drive automatically without software
correct_answer: SAS allows for dual-ported drives, enabling redundant data paths
explanation: SAS drives often feature dual ports to connect to multiple controllers, enabling failover and redundancy in critical systems.
